name: PCKG_ISSUE
body_snippet:
package PCKG_ISSUE is

  -- Author  : GULISTAN
  -- Created : 11/18/2003 8:39:55 AM
  -- Purpose : 
  
  -- Public type declarations
  PROCEDURE PRO_ISSUE_POSTING(parm_issue_id         NUMBER,
                              parm_book_id          NUMBER,
                              parm_from_date        DATE,
                              parm_to_date          DATE,
                              parm_period_id        NUMBER,
                              parm_issue_no         NUMBER,
                              parm_journal_id       NUMBER,
                              parm_entered_by       NUMBER,
                              parm_trans_type       VARCHAR2,
                              parm_post_to_gl       NUMBER,
                              parm_inserted_jrn_id  OUT NUMBER,
                              parm_send_for_auth    NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,          ----these three parameters are added
                              parm_auth_id          NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,          ----by shahid ,to ensuring authorization 
                              parm_auth_status_id   NUMBER DEFAULT NULL);         ----processes
  FUNCTION FUN_GET_PERIOD_ID(parm_sob_id NUMBER,
                             parm_from_date DATE,
                             parm_to_date DATE) RETURN NUMBER;

end PCKG_ISSUE;
